page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT SURVEY- Female
page.content:
No. of Mothers employed: 19 Full-time: 2 Part-time: 17 {************************************** { {Types of Employment } Clerical: 4 Factory Worker: 1 Teacher: 6 Shop Assistant: 1 Nurse: 2 Domestic: 3 Dentist: 1 Dinner Lady: 1 {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ { Travel to Employment} 11 Mothers travel to work by car. 6 Mothers travel to work by bus. 2 Mothers travel to work on foot. {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ {Length of Employment in years } Less than 1: 4 1-5: 9 Over 5: 6 { {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
{These results are based on 42 or 72% {of surveys returned to Class 2. }
